name: Outside World
description:
======= Game Description =======


Lost and bewildered in an exotic world, Kyrsten wishes nothing but a way home. With the help of a newly-met ghost-like friend Jaynie, her surreal journey of exploration begins. Travel through the strange land and solve puzzles to get Kyrsten home.


======= Features: =======


Easy to play, challenging to complete
Original 3D design, sound and music
No ads, no in app purchase
Optimised for tablets and phones


======= Version 2 Update from the old version: =======

Note that this update will delete any game progress you have so far, since all levels are completely rebuilt from zero up.

- Two new levels
- All codes rewritten
- Upgraded graphics
- Amended and new original soundtracks
- Better performance


*Progress is automatically saved when a level a complete, if you leave game before a level is complete you will have to start from the beginning of that level next time.
